THANKS ALOT.

Just to confirm, this game is *NOT* compatible with pcsx2 - it simply crashes after the initial loading screen.

So for all of you hoping to play Call Of Duty 3 on a PC - you'll just have to wait until a more stable version of the emulator to comes out. 

In the meantime, you can visit 

http://www.pcsx2.net/compat.php?c=key

for the current compatibility list.
